title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The All types dialog in JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (e.g., classes named 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd'). These obfuscated classes are currently displayed prominently in the dialog.
OB: The obfuscated classes are displayed prominently in the All types dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be displayed less prominently in the All types dialog.
SR:
To address this issue, I suggest either:

a) Sorting the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter
b) Filtering out the obfuscated classes completely
